resources.name: Login
resources.description:
### All submission fields are required
- email - must be string
- password - must be string

#### This route does not need authentication

### Expected return

**STATUS 201 CREATED**
```json

	"token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpYXQiOjE2NzU2MjAxNjksImV4cCI6MTY3NTcwNjU2OSwic3ViIjoiZjhmMTFiYTUtODliYy00YjU4LWFlMzgtMDEzYTdhNzAxMjliIn0.r_CdEsO1beY_EcJ_JDmw5pKdfZxGgfWYwhqjRASjehU",

}
```

resources.name: User Contacts
resources.description:
A simple api for the registration of users and contacts

Access the repository

resources.name: Create
resources.description:
### All submission fields are required
- name - must be string
- email - must be string
- phone - must be string

#### This route does not need authentication

### Expected return

**STATUS 201 CREATED**
```json
{
	"name": "contact1",
	"email": "contact1@mail.com",
	"phone": "111111111",
	"id": "50928d1a-a9e7-4246-963e-f13e5c5219a1",
	"createdAt": "2023-02-05T18:10:28.107Z",
	"updatedAt": "2023-02-05T18:10:28.107Z"
}
```
